description: supply and delivery of items as specified
duration_in_months: Well, that's a quite interesting one.
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement: Plastic Waste Processor, Parts
## Issue Date: 2023-11-14
### Closing Date: 2023-12-14 at 14:00:00 EST

The Department of National Defence is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the procurement of plastic waste processor parts. This tender is made under the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA) and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

### Procurement Details:

* **Title**: Plastic Waste Processor, Parts
* **Gisin ( Goods and Services Identification Number)**: 5340, 3010, 3040, 5365, 5360
* **Description of Requirements**: The following items are required for delivery to CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia.
	+ Item 1: Bracket, mounting (5340); 2 units
	+ Item 2: Bracket, mounting (5340); 42 units
	+ Item 3: Gear assembly, speed decreaser (3010); 5 units
	+ Item 4: Gear assembly, speed decreaser (3010); 13 units
	+ Item 5: Universal joint, non-vehicular (3010); 2 units
	+ Item 6: Universal joint, non-vehicular (3010); 8 units
	+ Item 7: Cylinder assembly, actuating, linear (3040); 8 units
	+ Item 8: Cylinder assembly, actuating, linear (3040); 6 units
	+ Item 9: Shim set (5365); 15 units
	+ Item 10: Shim set (5365); 35 units
	+ Item 11: Spring, helical, torsional (5360); 7 units
	+ Item 12: Spring, helical, torsional (5360); 13 units
	+ Item 13: Spring, gas, compression (5360); 15 units (or 28 units)
	+ Item 14: Spring, gas, compression (5360); 28 units (or 15 units)

### Condition of Contract:

* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.
* Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number and the NCAGE (
